title: Siri S. Eide
text:
Siri is an Oslo based composer, working primarily with instrumental music. She is also fascinated by the intersection between music and technology, and has a great fondness for video.
After completing a MSc in Physics and Mathematics at the Norwegian University of Science and Technology, and working as a computer scientist for several years, Siri is currently studying Composition at the Norwegian Academy of Music, while also working towards a PhD in Deep Learning at the Norwegian Meteorological Institute.
